text: In military terms, 74th Division may refer to: * 74th Division (People's Republic of China), 1949–1952; later the 70th Motorized Infantry Brigade * 74th Division (2nd Formation)(People's Republic of China), 1969–1976 * 74th (Yeomanry) Division, a Territorial Force infantry unit of the British Army in the First World War * 74th Infantry Division (United States) * 74th Rifle Division (Soviet Union), see list of infantry divisions of the Soviet Union 1917–57 ==See also== * List of military divisions by number
title: 74th Division
